mapper.select: select board_no, title, content, writer, click_cnt, creation_date from board_tbl

select b.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from board_tbl where
title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
writer like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or writer like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
1 = 1
order by board_no desc) a
where rownum <= (#{page} * 5)) b
where b.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 5

select count(1) from board_tbl where
title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
writer like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or writer like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
1 = 1
mapper.insert: insert into board_tbl (board_no, title, content, writer) values(board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
insert into member (user_id, user_pw, user_name) values (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName})
